description: This file is an ESLint configuration script written in JavaScript using ES module syntax, configuring ESLint for a Next.js project with specific presets.

methods.name: fileURLToPath
methods.description: Converts a URL to a local file path.

methods.name: dirname
methods.description: Returns the directory name of a path.

methods.name: compat.extends
methods.description: Extends the ESLint config with specified configurations.
